hasBase(Color) - Method in class game.Tile
Checks whether or not this Tile contains a base of the given Color.
hasRing(boolean, int, Color, int, boolean) - Method in class game.Board
Checks if the current ring size can be placed, based on amount of current ring size is left to place for the current player.
